original_text: They travelled until they reached a place to sleep that night. One of the brothers opened his bag to get food for his donkey. Then he saw his money inside his bag, at the top.
korean_text: 한 사람이 여관에서 나귀에게 먹이를 주려고 자루를 풀고 본즉 그 돈이 자루 아귀에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: They travelled until they reached a place to sleep
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 잠을 잘 장소에 도착할 때까지 여행했습니다

sentences.original_text: One of the brothers opened his bag
sentences.korean_translation: 형제 중 한 명이 그의 가방을 열었습니다

sentences.original_text: to get food for his donkey
